summary: This document appears to be internal union correspondence regarding staffing reassignments at MCC New York, specifically concerning probationary correctional officers being moved from Special Housing Unit (SHU) posts. It references employee rights under the Master Agreement and requests justification for the policy change.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.address: 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: Federal prison facility where staffing reassignments are being discussed

keyFacts: Management at MCC New York has decided to reassign probationary correctional officers from Special Housing Unit (SHU) posts
The document references employee rights under the Master Agreement, specifically Article 18 Section r and s
A request is made for the policy, rule, law or regulation that prohibits probationary employees from working in the Special Housing Unit
The document includes a quote from Serena Williams: 'I don't cheat to win, I'd rather lose'
This appears to be union correspondence addressing staffing changes at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York
